programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.sub-title: Holloway vs VanCamp and more
programme.desc: An exciting bare knuckle fight between Truckon Carson vs Daishaun Middleton opens up the show followed by Derek Perez vs Sam Samples, Jeremiah Scott vs Chevvy Bridges, and Jeremie Halloway challenges Cameron VanCamp.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.sub-title: Mundell vs Coltrane and more
programme.desc: Featuring Nathan Rivera vs Jaymes Hyder, Sawyer Depee trades hands with Jonathan Miller, Julian Lane fights Murat Kazgan and David Mundell battles challenger Doug Coltrane in a middleweight title fight.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.sub-title: Rosalinda Rodriguez vs Christina Crist & More
programme.desc: Featuring exciting bare knuckle fight action Leandro Torres dukes it up with Harry Cruz, Dameko Labon takes on Justin Watson in the squared circle, Leonardo Perdomo fights Ryan Shough and Rosalinda Rodriguez takes on Christina Crist.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.sub-title: Mike Perry vs Eddie Alvarez & More
programme.desc: The best of bare knuckle fight action with Jeremy Stephens vs Jimmie Rivera, Christine Ferea vs Bec Rawlings, and topped off with Mike Perry vs Eddie Alvarez.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.sub-title: Kai Stewart vs Howard Davis & More
programme.desc: Ben Moa and Bridger Bercier enter the squared circle, then Mick Terril takes on Arnold Adams, and Kai Stewart battles Howard Davis in a crowd thriller.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.sub-title: Erick Lozano vs Mike Jones & More
programme.desc: We open with Danny Hilton vs LJ Schulz, Trever Bradshaw vs Troy Dennison, Esteban Rodriguez vs Keegan Vandermeer and finishes off with an epic battle between Erick Lozano vs Mike Jones.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.sub-title: Donald Sanchez vs Noah Cutter & More
programme.desc: The best of bare knuckle fighting featuring Will Albrecht vs Freddy Sandoval, crowd thriller Eric Dodson vs Dakota Highpine, and finshes off with Donald Sanchez vs Noah Cutter.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.sub-title: Ismail Israilov vs Don Mohammed & More
programme.desc: A collection of battles featuring Felipe Chavez vs. Michael Manno, Karla Alvarez vs. Brittany Horton, Juan Adams vs. Matt Adams and rounds out the hour with Ismail Israilov taking on Don Mohammed.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.sub-title: Austin Trout vs Luis Palomino & More
programme.desc: Bryan Duran battles Louie Lopez, followed by Bryce Henry vs Robbie Peralta and wraps up with a fight between Austin Trout and Luis Palomino.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.sub-title: Jomi Escoboza vs Isaac Doolittle & More
programme.desc: An exciting bare knuckle fight between Justin Ibarrola vs Landon Williams opens up the show followed by Leonardo Perdomo vs Bobby Brents, Alberto Blas vs Daniel Alvarez, and Jomi Escoboza challenges Isaac Doolittle.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.sub-title: Edgard Plazoala vs Darrick Gates & More
programme.desc: Featuring Ryan Reber vs Derek Perez, Chris Garcia trades hands with Albert Inclan, and Edgard Plazoala battles challenger Darrick Gates.
